name: apex
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: where should we land
des:
Ask Alexa to choose a landing spot for you and your squad in Season 4 of Apex Legends

To start, just say "Alexa, where should we landing". You can also ask for a new choice if you dislike Alexa's first command, simply say "Alexa, where we landing" or "Alexa, pick somewhere else" to get a landing spot.

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
